title: OptionPower
description: Indicates a specific action the player can perform

option_index.description: Index value to use when the user selects this option

main_option.description: First/only option the player can perform

sub_options.description: Possible followup options to perform after `main_option` property. eg: choose-one after raven idol

sub_option_index.description: Index value to use when the user selects this sub-option. Not relevant when this option is used as `main_option`

entityID.description: Entity which corresponds to this sub-option. This entity MUST already exist in the SETASIDE zone

targets.description: Possible target for this sub-option. eg: when a silence spell is chosen and a minion must be selected
